Room.Name: Necropolis Circle
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the path which leads west and around the fountain to the east.
Room.LongDescription: A white, great marble fountain looks appealing. Maybe you can rest there from the chilling breeze which whistles through a small grove of dead and ugly looking trees to the south. The low, white building appears to be the administration building, where you will go to arrange a resting place for your companions if you make it out.
